targets.expr: ceil(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{image!="",namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) by (pod_name))
ceil(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{image!="",namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) by (pod_name))
jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{gc="G1 Young Generation",job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}
increase(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{gc="G1 Young Generation",job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}[1m])

panels.title: 年轻代GC次数增长数/每分

targets.expr: jvm_threads_state{job="$workload",namespace="$namespace",state="RUNNABLE"}
jvm_threads_state{job="$workload",namespace="$namespace",state="TIMED_WAITING"}
jvm_threads_state{job="$workload",namespace="$namespace",state="BLOCKED"}
jvm_threads_state{job="$workload",namespace="$namespace",state="WAITING"}
jvm_threads_current{job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}
jvm_threads_deadlocked{job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{pool="G1 Old Gen",job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}/jvm_memory_pool_bytes_committed{pool="G1 Old Gen",job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}*100
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{pool="G1 Old Gen",job="$workload",namespace="$namespace"}/1024/1024
